name: Ceaseless Night
description:
Ceaseless Night is a strategic roguelike that captures the essence of dungeon crawling in a bleak world.

Gather Your Party

Whether through finding adventurers in the dungeons or stumbling upon those that wander into camp, you must assemble a party of up to 4 heroes to fight in hopes of reclaiming the light. Discover new trinkets, Slay monsters ranging from rats, to oozes, to dragons. Survive using your wit, skill, and a bit of luck.

Core Of the Game

  • 19 different classes that change the way you strategize and interact with dungeons.
  • Manage your resources: time, money, and health.
  • Full narration and impeccable soundtrack.
  • Quick and accessible dungeon crawls allow for a dungeon before bed or a full night of strategizing.
  • Roguelike permadeath, procedural dungeon generation, and team synergies to discover.

Will your party overcome the Lich King's forces and end this ceaseless night?
